metadata.name: easter egg #1
metadata.description:
Christians believe that the egg is a symbol of Jesus Christ's resurrection. It looks cold and dead from the outside, but new life is growing inside. The egg is thus symbolic for Jesus' grave from where he rose on Easter Monday.

Only the nft owner can claim the physical artwork easter egg #1 from Marian Kretschmer until 31.12.2025

https://www.tropee.com/utility/claim-your-physical-easter-egg-1-artwork-from-marian-kretschmer/01GXTWMFT6PKME44YHSXFFKFDD

attributes.trait_type: Deadline to claim the physical artwork
